column1: '''Lórindol''' was the surname given to [[Hador]] son of [[Hathol]] of the [[House of Hador|Third House of the Edain]]. Lórindol is an [[Elvish]] word meaning "Goldenhead" or (less accurately) "Golden-haired"
column3: ''Hador''</ref> a reference to the golden hair of Hador
column4: a trait shared by many other members of his House.
